person.persName: Daniel Glanton (Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and coroner)

body.p: Ballard County, Kentucky, farmer and coroner. Alabama native. Married to Amelia A. Glanton. Father of John Glanton. Farmer and coroner in Ballard County in 1860.
